TripInvitationBody.en: You are invited to take part in '{0}' trip organized by {1}. {2}

TripInvitationTitle.en: {0} invited you to join a trip

FriendshipRequestBody.en: If you know him/her, I guess you would like to confirm it

NewUserWelcomeBody.en: Our app is still in beta, please be patient with us :) We are improving and developing fast. Explore how you can organize documents for your travel, invite your friends on your custom trips, pin the places you have visited and compare with your friends. Our Wiki has information collected by real travelers from all around the world.

TripRequestTitle.en: User {0} requested to join your trip {1}

TripRequestBody.en: Would you like to invite him/her?
